verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> Are these <S%G5023><s%> things so? <S%G3779><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Get <S%G1831><s%> you out of your country, <S%G1093><s%> and from your kindred, <S%G4772><s%> and come <S%G1204><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I shall show <S%G1166><s%> you.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> he out of the land <S%G1093><s%> of the Chaldaeans, <S%G5466><s%> and dwelled <S%G2730><s%> in Charran: <S%G5488><s%> and from there, <S%G1564><s%> when <S%G3326><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> was dead, <S%G599><s%> he removed <S%G3351><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3757><s%> you now <S%G3568><s%> dwell. <S%G2730><s%>

And he gave <S%G1325><s%> him none <S%G3756><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in it, no, not so much as to set <S%G968><s%> his foot <S%G4228><s%> on: yet <S%G2532><s%> he promised <S%G1861><s%> that he would give <S%G1325><s%> it to him for a possession, <S%G2697><s%> and to his seed <S%G4690><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him, when as yet he had <S%G5607><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> child. <S%G5043><s%>

And God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> on this <S%G3779><s%> wise, That his seed <S%G4690><s%> should sojourn <S%G1510><s%> <S%G3941><s%> in a strange <S%G245><s%> land; <S%G1093><s%> and that they should bring <S%G1402><s%> them into bondage, <S%G1402><s%> and entreat <S%G2559><s%> them evil <S%G2559><s%> four <S%G5071><s%> hundred <S%G5071><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

And the nation <S%G1484><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> they shall be in bondage <S%G1398><s%> will I judge, <S%G2919><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> that shall they come <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and serve <S%G3000><s%> me in this <S%G5129><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>

And he gave <S%G1325><s%> him the covenant <S%G1242><s%> of circumcision: <S%G4061><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> Abraham begat <S%G1080><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and circumcised <S%G4059><s%> him the eighth <S%G3590><s%> day; <S%G2250><s%> and Isaac <S%G2464><s%> begat Jacob; <S%G2384><s%> and Jacob <S%G2384><s%> begat the twelve <S%G1427><s%> patriarchs. <S%G3966><s%>

And delivered <S%G1807><s%> him out of all <S%G3956><s%> his afflictions, <S%G2347><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> him favor <S%G5485><s%> and wisdom <S%G4678><s%> in the sight <S%G1726><s%> of Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%> king <S%G935><s%> of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> and he made <S%G2525><s%> him governor <S%G2233><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> and all <S%G3650><s%> his house. <S%G3624><s%>

But when Jacob <S%G2384><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that there was corn <S%G4621><s%> in Egypt, <S%G125><s%> he sent <S%G1821><s%> out our fathers <S%G3962><s%> first. <S%G4412><s%>

And at <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time Joseph <S%G2501><s%> was made <S%G319><s%> known <S%G319><s%> to his brothers; <S%G80><s%> and Joseph's <S%G2501><s%> kindred <S%G1085><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> known <S%G5318><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%G5328><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> and died, <S%G5053><s%> he, and our fathers, <S%G3962><s%>

And when he was cast <S%G1620><s%> out, Pharaoh's <S%G5328><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> took <S%G337><s%> him up, and nourished <S%G397><s%> him for her own <S%G1438><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>

And Moses <S%G3475><s%> was learned <S%G3811><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%G124><s%> and was mighty <S%G1415><s%> in words <S%G3056><s%> and in deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And when <S%G5613><s%> he was full <S%G4137><s%> forty <S%G5063><s%> years <S%G5063><s%> old, <S%G5550><s%> it came <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> his heart <S%G2588><s%> to visit <S%G1980><s%> his brothers <S%G80><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> and was a stranger <S%G3941><s%> in the land <S%G1093><s%> of Madian, <S%G3099><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he begat <S%G1080><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons. <S%G5207><s%>

When Moses <S%G3475><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he wondered <S%G2296><s%> at the sight: <S%G3705><s%> and as he drew <S%G4334><s%> near <S%G4334><s%> to behold <S%G2657><s%> it, the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the LORD <S%G2962><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to him,

Saying, I am the God <S%G2316><s%> of your fathers, <S%G3962><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%> Then <S%G1161><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> trembled, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1790><s%> and dared <S%G5111><s%> not behold. <S%G2657><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> to him, Put <S%G3089><s%> off <S%G3089><s%> your shoes <S%G5266><s%> from your feet: <S%G4228><s%> for the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you stand <S%G2476><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> ground. <S%G1093><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is that Moses, <S%G3475><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> A prophet <S%G4396><s%> shall the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raise <S%G450><s%> up to you of your <S%G5216><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> to me; him shall you hear. <S%G191><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and gave <S%G3860><s%> them up to worship <S%G3000><s%> the host <S%G4756><s%> of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> as it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> O you house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> have you offered <S%G4374><s%> to me slain <S%G4968><s%> beasts <S%G4968><s%> and sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> by the space of forty <S%G5062><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> in the wilderness? <S%G2048><s%>

Our fathers <S%G3962><s%> had <S%G1510><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of witness <S%G3142><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> as he had appointed, <S%G1299><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> to Moses, <S%G3475><s%> that he should make <S%G4160><s%> it according <S%G2596><s%> to the fashion <S%G5179><s%> that he had seen. <S%G3708><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%> that came <S%G1237><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> brought <S%G1521><s%> in with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the possession <S%G2697><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> drove <S%G1856><s%> out before <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> to the days <S%G2250><s%> of David; <S%G1138><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> favor <S%G5485><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and desired <S%G154><s%> to find <S%G2147><s%> a tabernacle <S%G4638><s%> for the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%>
But Solomon <S%G4672><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> him an house. <S%G3624><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> the most <S%G5310><s%> High <S%G5310><s%> dwells <S%G2730><s%> not in temples <S%G3485><s%> made <S%G5499><s%> with hands; <S%G5499><s%> as said <S%G3004><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%>

Has not my hand <S%G5495><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things?

You stiff necked <S%G4644><s%> and uncircumcised <S%G564><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%> and ears, <S%G3775><s%> you do always <S%G104><s%> resist <S%G496><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%> as your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> did, so <S%G2532><s%> do you.

Which <S%G5101><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have not your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> persecuted? <S%G1377><s%> and they have slain <S%G615><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> showed <S%G4293><s%> before <S%G4293><s%> of the coming <S%G1660><s%> of the Just <S%G1342><s%> One; of whom <S%G3739><s%> you have been <S%G1096><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> the betrayers <S%G4273><s%> and murderers: <S%G5406><s%>
Who <S%G3748><s%> have received <S%G2983><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> by the disposition <S%G1296><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> and have not kept <S%G5442><s%> it.
